citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection, the Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) required under the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) could
not be located. As a result, the PVC could not be reviewed during the inspection.
Per this Section. all documents that are required to be kept under the AWA should be available at the time of an
inspection so the required documents can be reviewed to determine compliance with the provisions of the AWA. Copies
of all documents and records required under the AWA must be kept on the premises and available for review. Correct by
December 23, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of the inspection, the Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) required under the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) could 
not be located. As a result, the PVC could not be reviewed during the inspection. 
 
Per this Section. all documents that are required to be kept under the AWA should be available at the time of an 
inspection so the required documents can be reviewed to determine compliance with the provisions of the AWA. Copies 
of all documents and records required under the AWA must be kept on the premises and available for review. Correct by 
December 23, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
